statements: SELECT * FROM customer_segments;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id = 2 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id = 3 ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT segment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customer_segments GROUP BY segment_name HAVING total_customers > 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id = 1 ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name = 'VIP'
SELECT customer_id, segment_id, segment_name FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE last_name LIKE '%son%'
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name = 'Regular' ORDER BY first_name, last_name
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, gender, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, email, age FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND location = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT c.customer_name, s.segment_name FROM customers c INNER JOIN segment_customers sc ON c.customer_id = sc.customer_id INNER JOIN segments s ON sc.segment_id = s.segment_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, location FROM customers ORDER BY age ASC, customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_location = 'New York';
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_gender FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers ORDER BY customer_location ASC;
SELECT customer_name, segment_name FROM customers JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id = customer_segments.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_location='New York' AND customer_gender='Male';
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_customers, AVG(customer_age) as avg_age FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_age, customer_gender FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_age DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT customers.customer_name, purchases.purchase_amount, products.product_name FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id WHERE products.product_category = 'Electronics' AND purchases.purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchases.purchase_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, customer_age, purchase_amount FROM customers LEFT JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customer_age >= 30 AND customer_age <= 50 AND purchase_amount IS NULL;
SELECT customer_name, segment_name FROM customers JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id = customer_segments.segment_id WHERE segment_description LIKE '%VIP%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;

SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, product_name, product_price FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id WHERE product_price > 500 ORDER BY product_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegmentation ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, gender, location FROM CustomerSegmentation WHERE segment_type = 'VIP'
SELECT customer_id, segment_type FROM CustomerSegmentation WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'FEMALE'
SELECT * FROM Demographics ORDER BY income ASC, children_count DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, income, occupation FROM Demographics WHERE marital_status = 'MARRIED'
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegmentation ORDER BY age DESC, location ASC
SELECT name, age, gender FROM CustomerSegmentation WHERE age >= 30 AND location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT customer_id, name, segment_type FROM CustomerSegmentation WHERE gender = 'Female' AND segment_type = 'VIP'
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE target_segment = 'High Income'
